name: Sponge Highway!
description:
Sponge Highway is our entry to the AGD Slam Jam for 2022! 
Big thanks to Sean for hosting the Jam! 

Throw Sponges into traffic to cause chaos and SOAK OUT the highway! 

Controls: 
Use the mouse to look around and the left mouse click (or space) to throw sponges! 

Tell us your High Scores! 

Credits: 
Aiden Gyory - Designer and Programmer
Jamie Appleby - Artist
